title: Moms in the Bible
itunes:author: Guest: Rhonda Stoppe
itunes:summary:
It's amazing what lessons we can learn from characters in the Bible. Even though they lived many years ago, their examples still speak to us today. John and Danny share about some biblical who inspire them in their parenting. Featuring Rhonda Stoppe.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Rhonda Stoppe's book "Moms Raising Sons to be Men" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-11-16?refcd=1299906

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/moms-in-the-bible/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
